original_text: Then Eleazar the priest is to take some of its blood on his finger and sprinkle it seven times toward the front of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 제사장 엘르아살은 손가락에 그 피를 찍고 그 피를 회막 앞을 향하여 일곱 번 뿌리고

sentences.original_text: is to take some of its blood on his finger
sentences.korean_translation: 그 피의 일부를 자기 손가락으로 가져가서

sentences.original_text: toward the front of the tent of meeting
